message.content:
To achieve this in LibreOffice Calc, you can use the following formula:

`=SUBSTITUTE(A1,"'","")`

This formula will copy the contents of cell A1 and remove any single quotes found within it. Replace "A1" with the actual cell reference from which you want to copy the data without single quotes.

For example, if you have a cell with the value 'Test', the formula will return 'Test' without the surrounding single quotes. If there are no single quotes in the original cell, the formula will simply return the same value as in the original cell.
